channel.title: Form Submission :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Forms collect data input by the user. As we learned in the previous chapter, communication on the web occurs via a series of HTTP requests and responses. A form submission is an HTTP request sent to the server containing the values in a form. Trigger Form Submission A form submission is triggered by clicking a button inside the form. A submit button can be an input element with type=submit or a button element. Both button types are in the below example.
